name: agent-coordinator
description: Sistema de coordinación de agentes para migración 9001app-v2 a MongoDB

scripts.full-migration: npm run build && node dist/index.js full-migration
scripts.mongodb: npm run build && node dist/index.js mongodb
scripts.typescript: npm run build && node dist/index.js typescript
scripts.security: npm run build && node dist/index.js security
scripts.structure: npm run build && node dist/index.js structure
scripts.api: npm run build && node dist/index.js api
scripts.web: npm run build && node dist/index.js web
scripts.status: npm run build && node dist/index.js status

author: 9001app-v2 Team
